about_the_game:
Simple Story:
four thieves decided to steal a house. They found out the owner is a killer, but the real problem is they can't leave the house! The owner made a game for the thieves if they lose, they will all die or if they win, they will leave the house.
About The Game:
The game simulate The thieves situation and you will deal with that. It has levels playable with party or single, In every level has a boss and you will deal with the boss to win the game, but if you didn't deal with him, you will die.
Stealth
Stealth to your goal and avoid the monster. If the monster catched you, he will kill you.
Help Each Other
Be helpful with your friends and help each other to escape the house with the items.
